summary: Oberhausen is a city in Germany, in the state of North Rhine-Westphalia, in the Ruhr Area.
full_text: Oberhausen  is a city on the river Emscher in the Ruhr Area, Germany, located between Duisburg  and Essen . The city hosts the International Short Film Festival Oberhausen and its Gasometer Oberhausen is an anchor point of the European Route of Industrial Heritage. The city's Sea Life Centre was home to Paul the Octopus.
title: Oberhausen
